name: Phantom-Man
description:
A game made for Brackeys Jam 2020.2 with the theme "Rewind"!

The sandghosts are attacking again!

You, the Phantom-Man, have the powers to create phantom 
illusions to fight the enemies!

Fend them off, Be our saviour! Gameplay:
  • Control Phantom-Man, shoot down the emerging sand-ghosts
  • You have the power to copy a phantom-self from a different reality to aid you in battle!
  • There are 2 types of phantoms:
    • Good phantom: A Phantom of Phantom-Man from a different reality. Performs all of Phantom-man's action in a reversed timeline
    • Corrupted phantom: Due to the instability of this power, phantoms are corrupted in every other copy. beware, it can attack phantom-man!
